data_description.id_or_passport: The goverment ID or passport number provided when registering with Ituran.
data_description.phone_number: The mobile phone number provided when registering with Ituran. A one-time password will be sent to this mobile number.

data_description.otp: A one-time-password sent as a text message to the mobile phone number provided before.

api_error.message: An error occured while communicating with the Ituran service.

auth_error.message: Failed authenticating with the Ituran service, please remove and re-add integration.
